attributes.action: increase the level of Employment & support allowance to match that of the old Incapacity benefit
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Why should I have my income cut due to my being transfered onto employment & support allowance from Incapacity benefit. 
This has cost me and many others £20 per week during a time of economic instability and made it even harder than ever to make ends meet. 
I feel along with others, let down by the desicion.
